headline: Is Intuit’s (INTU) Cautious Outlook and DEI ROI Audit Push Reframing Its Risk‑Reward Story?
summary: In December 2025, the National Center for Public Policy Research filed an exempted solicitation with the SEC urging Intuit shareholders to support a proposal for an ROI audit of the company’s diversity and inclusion programs at the 2025 annual meeting. These governance and disclosure pressures emerged just as Intuit reported strong fiscal-year performance but issued cautious guidance for fiscal 2026, prompting investors to reassess how management balances growth ambitions, risk oversight,...

headline: Jefferies’ top software stocks to own led by Microsoft, Meta
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies is urging investors to remain selective in software in 2026, arguing that growth “decelerates and lags versus other sectors like semis,” and recommending an underweight position until artificial intelligence monetisation becomes more visible.
